locations.name: Tokyo
locations.description: Japan's bustling capital city, described as a dazzling metropolis balancing modernity (Shibuya, Shinjuku) with traditional tranquility (Yanaka, Imperial Gardens).

locations.name: Kyoto
locations.description: The cultural heart of Japan, renowned for its temples (Kinkaku-ji, Fushimi Inari), bamboo groves (Arashiyama), and the historic Gion district.

locations.name: Hakone
locations.description: A mountain resort town in a volcanic national park, famous for its hot springs (onsen), Lake Ashi cruises, and potential views of Mt. Fuji.
